info.name: Luxury Wear
info.description: The available endpoints in the **Luxury Wear Service** API and their respective functionalities.

request.description:
Get information about a product by passing the product `id` as a path parameter.

### Response

Upon a successful request, the response will contain a `product` object matching the search criteria.

If no product with that ID is found, the request will return a `Not Found` error.

response.name: Succesful Response
Product Not found

request.description:
List all products that exist at the the database.

### Response

Upon a successful request, the response will return an array of nested products.

response.name: Successful Response

request.description:
returns the product list in pages of 10 items and accepts the page number as a path variable.

### Response

Return `Page<Product>`**: The response will be a `Page<Product>`, which includes pagination metadata like total pages, current page, and total elements.

response.name: Paginated Products first page

request.description:
List all products that exist at the the database. With the difference that with each call the products change order.

Response  
Upon a successful request, the response will return an array of nested products.

response.name: Successful Response
Successful Response different order

request.description: Deletes a `Product` by passing the product `id` as a path parameter.

response.name: Product not found
Create product without images, categories or sizes

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Vestido de Gala Elegante",
    "reference": "C-785",
    "description": "Un vestido de gala de seda con detalles brillantes.",
    "material": "Seda Italiana",
    "color": "Rojo Carmesi",
    "designer": "Von Braun",
    "price": 450000,
    "images": [],
    "categories": [],
    "sizes": []
}

response.body:
{
    "productId": 8,
    "name": "Vestido de Gala Elegante",
    "reference": "C-785",
    "description": "Un vestido de gala de seda con detalles brillantes.",
    "material": "Seda Italiana",
    "color": "Rojo Carmesi",
    "designer": "Von Braun",
    "price": 450000,
    "images": [],
    "categories": [],
    "sizes": []
}

response.name: Create Product with its respective sizes
Create product with categories and sizes
Create product with categories, sizes and images

request.description:
List all categories that exist at the the database.

### Response

Upon a successful request, the response will return an array of nested categories.

response.name: Successful Response

request.description:
List all sizes that exist at the the database.

### Response

Upon a successful request, the response will return an array of nested sizes.

response.name: OK
